7/28/08

AVGN Responds to Nostalgia Critic’s challenge

to review a bad nostalgic movie.

The result… RICKY 1

FOLLOW THE AVGN/ NOSTALGIA CRITIC FEUD:

4/18/08 - Nostalgia Critic calls out AVGN

4/19/08 - AVGN responds on forum. Nostalgia Critic analyzes hidden meaning.

4/27/08 - Nostalgia Critic is furious over AVGN’s “The Wizard” review.

5/4/08 - Nostalgia Critic reviews “The Wizard” and makes a radical discovery at the end.

6/12/08 - AVGN makes his long awaited video response to the Nostalgia Critic.

6/15/08 - Nostalgia Critic challenges AVGN to a bad movie review.

6/29/08 - LIVE appearance. Nostalgia Critic meets AVGN at Digital Press video game store with Captain S. The three of them fight to a stalemate. Finally, AVGN accepts the challenge to review a bad movie, and in return, challenges Nostalgia Critic to review a bad game.

7/28/08 - AVGN reviews the movie Ricky 1, and is furious at Nostalgia Critic for it. (see above)
